revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in two ways: Buying them from a shop or breeding a level 100 Pokémon. Getting the egg through the latter method will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == Shop Egg Pool == '''Kanto''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Charmander || Bulbasaur || Squirtle || Magnemite || Hitmonchan || Dratini |- | Growlithe || Oddish || Lapras || Pikachu || Hitmonlee || Dragonair |- | Ponyta || Bellsprout || Staryu || Voltorb || Machop || Dragonite |- | Vulpix || Tangela || Psyduck || Electabuzz || Mankey || |} '''Johto''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Cyndaquil || Chickorita || Totodile || Chinchou || Tyrogue || |- | Slugma || Hoppip || Wooper || Mareep || || |- | Houndour || Sunkern || Marill || Elekid || || |- | Magby || || Qwilfish || || || |} '''Hoenn''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Torchic || Treecko || Mudkip || Electrike || Makuhita || Bagon |- | Numel || Roselia || Feebas || Plusle || Meditite || Shelgon |- | || Tropius || Clamperl || Minun || || Salamence |} '''Sinnoh''' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | Chimchar || Turtwig || Piplup || Pachirisu || Riolu || Gible |- | || Carnivine || Finneon || Shinx || || Gabite |- | || Budew || Buizel || || || Garchomp |} ===Helpful Info=== When you enter the next area the Pokémon rates change. Assuming you've just entered Sinnoh the [[Water Egg]] table changes from ====In Hoenn==== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) ====In Sinnoh==== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) Which makes the chance of getting a Pokémon from the new region you entered 50% and dropping the total combination of all previous areas percent's down to 50% {{Eggs}}
{{Battle items}}
